sen.j: 朽木 紘綱（くつき ひろつな、天保6年（1835年）8月 - 嘉永7年閏7月19日 (旧暦)（1854年9月11日））は、丹波国福知山藩の世嗣。
sen.e: Hirotsuna KUTSUKI (September 1835 - August 12, 1854 [intercalary year]) was a successor of the Fukuchiyama Domain in Tanba Province.
sen.cmt: 嘉永7年閏7月19日 (旧暦)(1854年9月11日））→August 12, 1854 (intercalary year) としました。
sen.e: Hirotsuna KUTSUKI (September 1835 - September 11, 1854) was a successor of the Fukuchiyama Domain in Tanba Province.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ暦に訂正しました。
sen.e: Hirotsuna KUTSUKI (September 1835 - September 11, 1854) was a successor of the Fukuchiyama Domain in Tanba Province.

sen.j: 武蔵国六浦藩主・米倉昌寿の五男。
sen.e: He was the fifth son of Masanaga YONEKURA, the lord of the Mutsuura Domain in Musashi Province.
He was the fifth son of Masanaga YONEKURA, the lord of the Mutsuura Domain in Musashi Province.
He was the fifth son of Masanaga YONEKURA, the lord of the Mutsuura Domain in Musashi Province.
His lawful wife was the daughter of Tsunaeda KUCHIKI.
His lawful wife was the daughter of Tsunaeda KUCHIKI.
His lawful wife was the daughter of Tsunaeda KUCHIKI.
His official court rank was Kawachi no kuni no kami (governor of Kawachi Province).
His official court rank was Kawachi no kuni no kami (governor of Kawachi Province).
His official court rank was Kawachi no kuni no kami (governor of Kawachi Province).

sen.j: 第12代藩主・朽木綱張の養子となり、10代藩主・綱条の娘を正室とする。
sen.e: He became the adopted son of the 12th domain lord (Fukuchiyama domain), Tsunaharu KUCHIKI, and took the 10th domain lord Tsunaeda's daughter as his lawful wife.
He became the adopted son of the 12th domain lord (Fukuchiyama Domain), Tsunaharu KUCHIKI, and took the 10th domain lord Tsunaeda's daughter as his lawful wife.
He became the adopted son of the 12th domain lord (Fukuchiyama Domain), Tsunaharu KUCHIKI, and took the 10th domain lord Tsunaeda's daughter as his lawful wife.

sen.j: しかし、家督相続前の嘉永7年（1854年）に早世した。
sen.e: However, he died young in 1854, before succeeding to the position of family head.
However, he died young in 1854, before succeeding to the position of family head.
However, he died young in 1854, before succeeding to the position of family head.

sen.j: 代わって、綱張の長男・朽木為綱が嫡子となった。
sen.e: The first son of Tsunaharu, Tametsuna KUCHIKI became the legitimate son, in stead.
The first son of Tsunaharu, Tametsuna KUCHIKI became the legitimate son, in stead.
The first son of Tsunaharu, Tametsuna KUCHIKI became the legitimate son, in stead.
